features: 3 Devices Switch with A Single Clicking: This keyboard and the mouse combo is able to connect to 3 Bluetooth devices at the same time. You can switch between 3 devices with a single key clicking.

Broad Compatibility: Use with all four major operating systems supporting Bluetooth (Windows, iOS, iPad OS, Android, and Mac OS), including Computer, Desktop, PC, Laptop / iPad Pro, iPad Air, iPad, iPad Min, iPhone, Smartphone / Android Tablets Surface etc.

7 Buttons Mouse for more Productive: Besides the right button, left button and the wheel, the mouse has a DPI button to switch the cursor DPI between 800 / 1200 / 1600 / 2000 / 2400 DPI. The mouse has 2 side-buttons for page backward and forward, and 1 button to switch windows.

Long Life Rechargeable Battery: Rechargeable lithium battery with an industry-high capacity lasts for 6 months for the keyboard and 4 months for the mouse with single charge (based on 2 hours non-stop use per day).
What You Get: Arteck HB305-3 Multi-Device Bluetooth Keyboard, MB167 Multi-Device Bluetooth Mouse, USB-C charging cable, welcome guide, our 24-months warranty and friendly customer service.
description: Product Description Switch between 3 Bluetooth Devices with a Single Clicking This keyboard and mouse combo is able to connect to 3 Bluetooth devices at the same time. After you pair the keyboard and mouse with 3 devices, you can simply switch to any paired device with a single key clicking. Cross Platform Compatible Fully functional to all four major operating system: Windows / iOS / iPad OS / Android / MacOS, and features system-specific function keys for each operating systems. Any Bluetooth supported devices such as laptop, computer, tablet, surface, smartphone can easily be paired and gained quick access to common functions, such as volume level, playback control, brightness, and more. Superior Ergonomic Design Scissors X structure and the low-profile keys offer quiet and comfortable typing. Ergonomic mouse reduce the stress with comfortable use.The mouse DPI switch allows you to change the speed of moving cursor between 800 / 1200 / 1600 / 2000 / 2400 DPI. Comfortable, quiet typing The whisper-quiet, low-profile keys bring a whole new level of comfort to your fingertips. What's more, keep all your most-used functions and media controls closer than ever Windows-dedicated hot keys. Keyboard with scissors kick construction can be used more than 3 million times continuously. Productive Side Buttons and Switch Button The mouse has side buttons which allow you to control page forward and backward for more productive work and the switch button allows you to switch different task in Windows. Rechargeable Battery Built-in industry-high rechargeable Li-polymer battery provides 6-month for the keyboard and 4-months for the mouse use on a single charge. (based on 2 hours' non-stop use per day)
